attributes.action: Appoint new members to the OFQUAL to resolve the A levels fiasco.
attributes.additional_details: An entire cohort of school leavers have been denied a chance to improve their life and enhance their futures by this furor caused by OFQUAL. The publics faith in the entire education sector will be negatively impacted by the current Board and will deny the teaching profession of future leaders who will choose a different career path than teaching.
attributes.background: The Government should remove all the current members of OFQUAL who have mismanaged the A Level results and cannot be trusted to come to an equitable solution. New members of the OFQUAL Board should include parents whose children have been devasted by this fiasco.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, including calls for people to be sacked.
